overview: Follow Captain Barnacles and his fellow Octonauts on their missions under the sea.  In these episodes the Octonauts explore the deepest part of the ocean – The Midnight Zone, Kwazii’s GUP-B goes missing, and the Octopod gets caught in the Arctic.  Includes 7 episodes plus learn more about marine life in the 7 creature reports!
title: Octonauts Ready For Action
